select:
SELECT * FROM ${sqlmap.tableName}
<#list sqlmap.sqlMapFields as field> <#if field.exactMatch> ${field.databaseFieldName} = #${field.javaFieldName}# </#if> </#list>
<#list sqlmap.sqlMapFields as field> <#if field.likeMatch> ${field.databaseFieldName} LIKE #${field.javaFieldName},handler=${sqlmap.likeHandlerAlias}# </#if> </#list>
ORDER BY <#list sqlmap.primaryKeyFields as field> ${field.databaseFieldName}<#if field_has_next>,</#if> </#list> LIMIT $page$, $pageSize$

SELECT * FROM ${sqlmap.tableName}
<#list sqlmap.sqlMapFields as field> <#if field.exactMatch> ${field.databaseFieldName} = #${field.javaFieldName}# </#if> </#list>
<#list sqlmap.sqlMapFields as field> <#if field.likeMatch> ${field.databaseFieldName} LIKE #${field.javaFieldName},handler=${sqlmap.likeHandlerAlias}# </#if> </#list>
ORDER BY <#list sqlmap.primaryKeyFields as field> ${field.databaseFieldName}<#if field_has_next>,</#if> </#list> LIMIT $page$, $pageSize$
